page.title: 03BERRYNARBOR SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built in 1847 and has about 50 children who are taught in two classrooms and the parish room.It also has one library/office and a kitchen. The children's ages are from 4\ to 11 years.There are two teachers and a dinner man who takes care of us at dinner time.There is a secretary and a lady in the kitchen who makes the school meals.We have assemblies in the morning except for Fridays when we have it in the afternoon. We have Educational Visits several times a year,and we have two sports days one of them is our own sports day and the other is with lots of other schools.We have two playtimes a day and three on Friday.We have lessons like maths english,reading, science,art,P.E. and project work.In the winter we go swimming. Some of the children come to school by bus from East Down.
